pr_title: Correct the logic of dataflow framework.

timeline.message:
BackwardAnalysis:
1. Add exception block's predecessor exception block to inputs (fix null pointer exception).
2. When running runAnalysisFor() with an exception block, pass a copied transfer input to callTransferFunction().

ForwardAnalysis:
1. When running runAnalysisFor() with an exception block, pass a copied transfer input to callTransferFunction().

timeline.bodyText: This is ugly... Is there a better way?
timeline.author: xingweitian

replies.bodyText: What is ugly?  The code duplication? There may be a better way, but let's worry about that when we have a third test case.
replies.author: smillst

timeline.bodyText: Should these two lines use issue3447?
timeline.author: wmdietl

timeline.bodyText: I would name the file and class Issue3447.
timeline.author: wmdietl
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,12 @@
+// Test case for Issue 3447:
+// https://github.com/typetools/checker-framework/issues/3447
+
+public class Test {

replies.bodyText: It seems that I cannot change the file name or class name from Test to Issue3447. It is hardcoded at LiveVariable.java#L23.
replies.author: xingweitian

timeline.bodyText: Does the test even produce an Out.txt file?
timeline.author: wmdietl

replies.bodyText: It does. This test relies on dataflow/src/test/java/livevar/LiveVariable.java.
replies.author: xingweitian

replies.bodyText: You're just not comparing against a golden file, but the test suite still generates the Out.txt file. Sounds good.
replies.author: wmdietl
